title: Help
content: \[4th sem, EC campus\] My Pesuacademy app and website access was blocked after that recent maintenance thing. I tried contacting support team, they have absolutely no idea. I went to my HOD, He asked me to meet the accounts Department, they said it will get fixed soon but it never did. Where do i go now? RR accounts?

comments.body: Just put a mail to [itteam.ec@pes.edu](mailto:itteam.ec@pes.edu) from your edu gmail account
it had happened to me, test in incognito window onces, if its working in incognito, then u just need to clear all the history of your browzer
Brother clear cookies , I was getting 404 error on brave. Try clearing all cookies or just shift to other browser.
